# This is a placeholder image file
# Replace this with your actual product images

# To add your own images:
# 1. Copy your image files to this directory
# 2. Name them like: product-name-color.jpg
# 3. Update your database with the filename

# Example: If you have a red t-shirt image:
# - Save it as: t-shirt-red.jpg
# - In your database, set: "image_url": "t-shirt-red.jpg"
